code: import axios from"axios";import{BASE_URL}from"../constants/urls";export var getCharacterList=function getCharacterList(saveData){axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/people")).then(function(res){return saveData(res.data.results);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err.response);});};export var getCharacter=function getCharacter(url,saveData){axios.get(url).then(function(res){return saveData(res.data);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err.response);});};export var getPlanet=function getPlanet(url,saveData){axios.get(url).then(function(res){return saveData(res.data.name);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err.response);});};
